DialogueOption.Text: Woah! Just saying my goodbyes, Mica. Why'd I have changed my mind?

Dialogue.Page: You tell me! You astronauts always change your first launches at the last minute.
Remember Gabbro's first launch? They delayed it just because they wanted to get another nap in first!
And Riebeck, well, Riebeck had good reason to delay theirs, at least.. They had to be grounded while they calmed their nerves.
Oh, oh - but remember Chert's first launch?
They delayed their first launch <Pause=1> SEVERAL <Pause=1> times. We had like, three farewell parties!

DialogueOption.Text: I don't remember that. Why'd Chert have so many delays?

Dialogue.Page: Beats me! I thought youâ€™d know, being in the space program and all.
Actually, I'm pretty sure they explained why at some point, but everyone was too excited to see the takeoff at last to remember that part.
Well hey, maybe if you take off soon... You can find Chert and ask them yourself about their launch day yourself!
